name: Colorful Sabbath
description:
Drag and drop witches to summoning points and create colors the demons need.

You must have all summoning spaces filled when the pentagram gets full.

For now the game only has 1 color / demon.

Everything from this project (and a little more...) is available here:
https://gitlab.com/latchbackgames/gmtk2021
You're free to use anything you want and do anything with it. Just remember that his is made in quick and dirty way!

Credits:
Lead programmer: Teemu Tammisalo
Jr Programmer: Juho Tommola
Lead Artist: Antti Salokannel
